message.p: If you want to sign in, you'll need to Register first.
Sign In below to take part in the web accessibility evaluation.
If you have more than one profile you can choose which one to use on the next page.

If you require any help please contact
amfortas@bentoweb.org

The sign-in process failed. You need to confirm your mail address first, by following the link in our last mail. If you have any problems, please contact:
amfortas@bentoweb.org
The sign-in process failed. You are registered but your account isn't activated yet. You will receive an e-mail from our administrator as soon as your account is active. Thank you, for your patience.
The sign-in process failed due to an invalid e-mail address or password. Please, try again: Sign-in

catalogue.message: Introduction to the BenToWeb Evaluation Website

message.p: Thank you for working with us to make the web more accessible.

The BenToWeb project has created this website to evaluate the accessibility of features commonly found on web pages that may cause users problems. These features include images, forms, and the use of colour.

You will be asked to provide information about individual features by answering questions and providing comments on examples of them that you will be shown on this website. It is important to understand the effects that the individual features have for a variety of people using the web to ensure that the accessibility of each aspect of the web is addressed.

The BenToWeb consortium will process the information resulting from the evaluations and report on it to the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) and the European Commission. The W3C is the body that develops the standards for the Web, and will have a important influence on how the accessibility of the Web develops in the future. This is the first time that such in-depth information from such a variety of users has been gathered and will greatly increase our knowledge of how people really use the Web. In working with us on this project, you help make the web more usable for everyone.

As this is a new way of collecting information from people, we ask you to be patient with any problems you encounter and to provide feedback to us about any problems and how easy it is to use (details of how to do this are found below).
Above all, please remember we are not evaluating your capabilities in using the web or your knowledge, but the effectiveness of the web in providing information to you.
You will immediately receive an e-mail containing a link to confirm your e-mail address.

Please complete the following questionnaire. This will enable us to present you with examples that match the main assistive technology and web browser you most commonly use - we call this your profile.
The questionnaire consists of three sections and all must be completed to register you as a BenToWeb evaluator.
You can add other profiles later if you wish by selecting the profile link in the menu. This may be useful if you use different combinations of assistive technologies on different occasions.

Once you have completed the questionnaire you will receive an e-mail to confirm your mail address. Afterwards, our adminstrator will activate your account. We will inform you via e-mail as soon as the evaluation process starts.
Note: All fields that are marked with the character '*' must be answered.

When you log in, the BenToWeb evaluation system will provide you with up to 20 example questions for the session, depending on how many are available that match your profile. These will be tailored to the computer and any assistive technologies that you use (the website will know about that from the questionnaire you completed). Please work your way through each example by first reading the instructions and then answering the question that follows. There is a button labelled ‘Next example’ at the bottom of each page which will move you on to the next example once you are happy with the answer you have given.

Sometimes you may find you are not able to complete the task asked about in the question. Do not worry about this, we are not testing you ability to use your browser or assistive technology, we are testing how well things work on the Web. So sometimes your browser or assistive technology may not present things to you correctly and you will not be able to do the task - but this is exactly what we need to find out. We hope this is not too frustrating for you.

You may find that you receive the same question or a question about the same test file more than once. Don’t worry about this, it is probably because we are testing a number of aspects of the same web format, for example, how it works for people with different disabilities and assistive technologies. You can track that you are receiving a different question by noting the number in the sequence that appears at the top of the question page. This will start with 1/20 (if the system has been able to find 20 questions that match your profile, it might be a smaller number), then 2/20 and so on as you progress through your set of example questions.

If you don’t know the answer, are unclear as to what is being asked, or feel that the online application is simply not working correctly please choose the ‘Don’t know’ button at the bottom of the page. This will take you to another page where you can provide feedback as to why you have not provided an answer, and then a button to receive the ‘Next example’.

Once you have completed all the examples in the set, your credit status will be calculated and you will be given the options to exit the application or evaluate another set of examples. You can also provide further feedback regarding the online application.
Thank you again for working with us to make the web more accessible.

In case of any problems, please don't hesitate to contact us:
amfortas@bentoweb.org

catalogue.message: Sorry, Amfortas is currently offline, cause of maintainance work!

message.p: Your profile enables us to present you with text examples that match any assistive technologies, device to access the web or specific web browsers you use.

catalogue.message: Before you start testing, please check your profile and update it if necessary.

message.p: Your profile was generated from the information you provided when you registered. If the information you provided when registering has changed (for example, you have upgraded the version of your assistive technology or your browser), please email our administrator make this the link?] with the changes and your profile will be updated. We will email you when this has been done and then you can undertake more testing. Any credit you have from previous testing will not be lost.

Please, check your account settings and contact our administrator in case of any wrong configurations:
amfortas@bentoweb.org

catalogue.message: Detailed view and active profile selection
Please read the question carefully, then follow the link to the test case and answer the question.
[opens a new window you should close before you go on]
If you don't know what to answer please specify the reason, press don't know button and the system will transfer you to the next available test:

message.p: Gratulations, you finished your test cases.
If you want to continue with further test cases, please follow the link: Start evaluation

message.p: No more test cases are available for your current test profile.
